definition: east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]

sentences.english: Form the mountain peaks in the east.
Five rivers run through the city, connecting it to the eastern Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 有五条河流从城市穿过，流人东边的渤海。

sentences.english: East of the boundary, mountain peaks on Kuh-i-Rahmat cast dark shadows to the north.
sentences.chinese: 在边界东边，拉赫马特山山峰在北侧投下阴影。

sentences.english: Farther east stand the Velvet Hills, whence we are bound.
sentences.chinese: 再远的东边屹立着天鹅绒山脉，那里是我们的边界了。

sentences.english: On the east side of the building, there is a promenade with an old growth poplar forest which acts as a windbreaker.
sentences.chinese: 在建筑的东边，由散布的原始白杨林充当防护林。

sentences.english: It's about 100 kilometres, east of Taibei.
sentences.chinese: 在台北东边，大约100公里左右。

sentences.english: You know, Tallahassee and Columbus are both, uh, east.
sentences.chinese: 你看，那个，塔拉哈西和哥伦布，都在，呃，东边。

sentences.english: In the east, the sky was becoming light.
The rising sun ensanguined the east sky.
sentences.chinese: 旭日染红了东边的天空。

sentences.english: Carry, suddenly see the wall of east top through come to a glimmer of glow-in-the-dark.
sentences.chinese: 背着背着，突然看到东边的墙壁上透过来一线亮光。

sentences.english: The airport stands in the eastern surburb of the city.
sentences.chinese: 机场位于城市东边郊区。

sentences.english: The territory of Manasseh reached the sea and bordered Asher on the north and Issachar on the east.
sentences.chinese: 北边到亚设，东边到以萨迦。

sentences.english: The sky has assumed a rosy wash in the east where a house is burning.
sentences.chinese: 东边有一所房子在燃烧，天空里染上了一抹玫瑰红。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the new SF Bay Bridge eastern span is 2.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，在建的旧金山湾大桥东边部分长2。

sentences.english: Inside the eastern side is a rectangular enclosure of about 10 stones.
sentences.chinese: 在东边那块里面又有大约10块石头被包围成矩形。

sentences.english: One east-side resident plants her boulevard with beans and other vegetables for public picking.
sentences.chinese: 东边一个居民还在林荫道里种上了豆子，供众人采摘。

definition: west/west side/western part/to the west of
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]
